content:
# It seems that the smelting process did not complete within the allotted time, resulting in a timeout error. 
# This could be due to insufficient fuel or an issue with the furnace's operation.

# Let's investigate the current status of the furnace to understand why it did not produce any iron plates.

furnace_status = get_entities({Prototype.StoneFurnace})  # Retrieve the current status of the Stone Furnace
print(f"Furnace Status: {furnace_status}")  # Print the furnace's status for debugging

# I will also check the inventory again to see if any iron plates were produced.
current_inventory = inspect_inventory()
print(f"Current Inventory: {current_inventory}")  # Check the inventory to see what is present

# If the furnace is still working, I will check the remaining fuel and iron ore to ensure that it has enough resources to continue processing.
if furnace_status:
    furnace = furnace_status[0]
    print(f"Furnace Fuel: {furnace.fuel}")  # Check how much fuel is left
    print(f"Furnace Source: {furnace.furnace_source}")  # Check how much iron ore is left
else:
    print("No furnace found.")  # In case the furnace is not present in the entities list.
